>
[Magnifying Scope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1214)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 181</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to firearm or crossbow (scope)

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These scopes use magically enhanced lenses to extend the range of your weapon and help spot distant foes. The scope grants you a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) creatures through the scope.

<document level="2" id="action-994" />
